thread.title: Great base to explore the city
thread.title_full: Great base to explore the city - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: AmyRoberts747
title: Great base to explore the city
text:
Stayed here the week before Christmas and had an excellent time.
Had a minor problem when we first arrived with the hotel saying they could not find our reservation, but we booked through a third party so I am quite sure it was not the hotels fault. They got us a room straight away and the issue was resolved.
Rooms a good size. Clean, modern and a great view of Times Square.
Overall a really good experience and would definitely recommend! Good location for exploring the city.
